query: Run oclaw onboard for the first time and verify it creates a valid config and memory files
expected_behavior: The onboard wizard prompts for LLM provider, API key, and default model interactively
A valid config.json5 is written to ~/.openclaw-clone/config.json5 after the wizard completes
Running 'oclaw config show' immediately after reads and displays the generated config with API keys redacted
MEMORY.md, SOUL.md, and AGENTS.md are created in the workspace directory
The wizard exits with code 0 and no unhandled errors
